column1: Little Goat Diner////LOVED IT! I was in town for a quick weekend getaway with my boyfriend and several friends recommended this place. It did not disappoint. It was a Sunday after the Cubs clinched the NLCS and the place was completely packed
column2: but that's what we were expecting. We went to the bar and got a bloody mary and an old fashioned - both great. The bar is open seating so two people luckily were getting up when we finished our drinks. I had the creole crumpets and John had a special breakfast Chicago dog in honor of the win. All of it was great
column4: and the staff was friendly even though they were so busy. When we are back in Chicago
